channel.title: Viewing Orb
channel.description:
Viewing Orb.
I want to add viewing orbs that would be in staff zone.
I looked on google to find it anyone posted a guide on how to add a working one but couldn't find it. I want to place a different location for the camera at like my home area so staff can watch from staffzone.
If anyone could please tell me or if you know of a guide please leme know.
Thank you everyone for all your help!
This is a 317 Pi

item.title: Viewing Orb
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Search around in the snippets section, Team_Rocket posted camera angle codes a while back

Read full topic
